report.title: Osiris tabular SATs
report.description: Tabular output for Osiris showing specific assemblages.
report.query: select #columns# from ( select t_sat.id as "id", s.id as "sample_id", t_sat.id as "term_id", case when p.id=t_sb.id then 0 else t_sat.parent_id end as "parent_sat_id", t_bb.term as "bb_term", t_sb.term as "sb_term", case when p.id=t_sb.id then '' else p.term || ' >> ' end || t_sat.term as "term", count(distinct o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) as "speciescount", count(distinct o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::float * 100 / ( select count(distinct ttlsub.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttlsub join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values avsub on avsub.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlsub.id and avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sat_attr_id# and avsub.int_value=t_sat.id ) as "rep", sqi.sqi, string_agg(coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation), '|' order by td.code) as "cons", it.threshold as "threshold", tcode.term as "code", case when count(distinct o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)>=it.threshold then 'Favourable' else 'Unfavourable' end as "condition" from cache_samples_functional s join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.website_id=s.website_id and o.survey_id=s.survey_id and o.sample_id=s.id join taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_bb on av_bb.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_bb.deleted=false and av_bb.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#bb_attr_id# join cache_termlists_terms t_bb on t_bb.id=av_bb.int_value join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sb on av_sb.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_sb.deleted=false and av_sb.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sb_attr_id# join cache_termlists_terms t_sb on t_sb.id=av_sb.int_value and t_sb.parent_id=t_bb.id join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sat on av_sat.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_sat.deleted=false and av_sat.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sat_attr_id# join cache_termlists_terms t_sat on t_sat.id=av_sat.int_value left join cache_termlists_terms tcode on tcode.meaning_id=t_sat.meaning_id and tcode.preferred=false left join pantheon.isis_thresholds it on it.code=tcode.term join cache_termlists_terms p on p.id=t_sat.parent_id and (p.parent_id=t_sb.id or t_sat.parent_id=t_sb.id) left join ( select av_sat1.int_value as sat_id, round(avg(rscv.int_value)*100) as sqi from cache_occurrences_functional o join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sat1 on av_sat1.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_sat1.deleted=false and av_sat1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sat_attr_id# join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#rarity_score_attr_id# where o.sample_id=#sample_id# group by av_sat1.int_value ) as sqi on sqi.sat_id=av_sat.int_value left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttd join taxon_designations td on td.id=ttd.taxon_designation_id and td.deleted=false and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('LC', 'None') ) on ttd.taxon_id=ttl.taxon_id and ttd.deleted=false #joins# where s.id=#sample_id# group by t_sat.id, s.id, t_sat.id, case when p.id=t_sb.id then 0 else t_sat.parent_id end, sqi.sqi, t_bb.term, t_sb.term, case when p.id=t_sb.id then '' else p.term || ' >> ' end || t_sat.term, it.threshold, tcode.term ) as sub

column.name: rep
column.sql: case when sub.rep<1 then '<1' else round(sub.rep)::varchar end
